content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving home from getting some ice cream when i noticed in the western sky a large  bright red/ orange orb. 

2. i noticed it because it was really different than anything else in the sky..It stuck out.

3. when i first noticed it, i thought it possibly could be a drone? 

4. here's the weird part.. i noticed the object driving west.. i turned to the north and pulled over the car. i got out to try and film it.. immediately when i started filming on my phone.. the bright red/orange orb just turned off! i was so confused! i got back in my car and turned up the next side street (west)... there i was again! again i got out of the car.. put my camera upto the sky.. and again is just turned off! it was pretty large as well to just disappear like that has me so confused.
content.summary: Red/orange  orb

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling home in our car after watching the women's world cup game at our daughter and son-in-law's home.  i just noticed a bright orange, very large star-like sighting a bit north of us over the wells village school soccer field more or less.  i said to my husband, wow, that is so orange, i can't believe it's a star and it's so big!  there was a red color on the top of it which appeared to blink a bit, so i thought it might be a plane.  we pulled off the road at the school to look at it more carefully, got out of the car and realized it couldn't be a plane...It was stationary and just too star-like and the blinking seemed to stop.  as we watched it, it almost seemed as though it was ascending, but we realized that it was just disappearing from our sight....Kind of going nowhere, it just vanished.  we are 73 years old and it was the strangest sighting in the sky either of us has ever seen!  we also thought it could be connected with last night being july 4th and/or the fact that the usa just won the world cup, but we soon realized it just couldn't be anything "typical" or fireworks-like.  it was too motionless and too much like a stationary star that was too big to be a star and bright orange with hints of red.... just nothing we could have made up!
content.summary: Looked at first like a huge orange star with some red on top side; stationary, about height of low flying airplane; red appeared to blink (thought it was a plane) then realized it couldn't be at which point it just got so small, it vanished!

content.detailedDescription: Around 2300 hours i stood on my deck ,like i usually do every night and stare up into the sky as i have a cigerrette. i noticed close to the direction i also stare at as there is bright star , not sure which star, i noticed a dark patch and i couldn't see the stars behind it. as i was trying to focus on it, it flashed really bright and shot straight up. at that time there was patches of clouds you could see but not many. as it shot up it disappeared. i then noticed the cloud in the direction it shot up was kind of blurry then another flash and it shot up towards space then i saw a faint flash and tha was it. the three flashes i saw got dimmer as it climbed higher. i was kind of kind of like in shock , did i just see what i saw. i kept playing it in my head. i called my wife and told her but she just smiled and wasn't helpful lol. i swore on everything i believe in to her on what i saw, then just left it at that.
content.summary: Observed dark patch of sky while looking up then object flashed and shot up 3  times

content.detailedDescription: While we were setting off fireworks just after the sun went below the horizon my kids noticed two red lights in the sky. i looked to where they were pointing. i thougth i was going to see an airplane, but there were two solid red lights that seemed to pulsate as they were moving slowly. they seemed to creep. i tried to take a picture of them, but they started to disappear then. i got one red dot in one of my pictures that you can barely see.
content.summary: Two red lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was at the thornton rec watching the firework show
2. what made you first notice the object?
it looked like a firework getting shot up
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a ufo
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
so it was a oval shaped object that had a red light and a green light that would blink when it moved forward and back
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.I was shocked and sort of freaked out by what i was seeing. i got 5 pictures of the object
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it slowly descended down behind a tree
content.summary: Looked up and saw object shoot up like a firework then stop mid air

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling west on i-495 outside of lawrence, mass.On nov. 17, 1978. the sun had just set but the sky was still light. i looked to the south and saw what looked like a bright florescent tube floating across the sky. it appeared to be heading closer to the highway i was on. we both converged on the highway at the same time. this 100' gray ufo came to a stop at the edge of the highway at tree top level and just sat there for a couple minutes. i was not the only one there. i-495 is a major highway and there were hundreds of people that just stopped their cars in the highway, got out of their cars, and just starred at this amazing spacecraft. a mass. state trooper pulled up with his lights flashing and was parked about 10 cars behind me. i know he saw it because it seemed to fill the sky. after a few minutes it just headed back toward boston very slowly. i received a pilots license at 16 and was a helicopter pilot in the army so i know a little about aircraft and this craft was not from this planet. the only unusual thing that i noticed was that air had static electrical charge of some sort to it. after it left, i also left, a changed man.  thank you.  rich
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 100' disc shaped ufo came up the the edge of highway and hovered for a few minutes and hovered away.

content.detailedDescription: Attending 4th of july party at lake anna.  just before setting off fireworks my daughter and i looked up because we heard a firework from the neighbors explode above us.  we looked up expecting more but instead we noticed a bright start like object up high in the sky.  it was about 30k feet or higher.  it was at the elevation a plane would fly.  at first we thought it was venus but then it started to move and suddenly left so incredibly fast that it was just gone in a straight line path instantly.  ben moss and tony angiola where also at this party.  ben saw the object as well but tony did not.
content.summary: Star like object hovered then left at a great speed

content.detailedDescription: Caminando vi al cielo dos figuras, tomé una foto con mi teléfono y al bajar la mirada y reestablecerla había desaparecido. no vi su trayectoria, cuando lo ví solo estaba estático.
content.summary: Lo vi por un momento y capturé la imagen con mi celular

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While sitting in our front yard watching the neighborhood fireworks we witnessed two different colored objects (could have been same objects but different colored, not sure). the first object was to the south. it had a blue/green glow to it and was moving about in an unusual pattern, rather erratically, no object known could move the way it moved. while looking at that object we heard several large fireworks being let off behind us so we turned to the north to try and see the firework. at this time i noticed an orb shaped glowing object. it was the color of fire, i originally thought it was a spark from the fireworks the neighbors were letting off so i continued to watch it so i could put it out if it landed in my yard. it continued travelling towards the south and i asked my husband and 16 year old son what it was. the object passed directly overhead and we were able to look more closely. it was not an open flame. it was some kind of orange glowing object. almost like a clear bubble with a bright point of orange in it that glared. the light seemed to reflect from the top of the object. the glare had almost a square aspect to it. it continued flying south in the same direction of the other object we saw until it disappeared into the smoke.
content.summary: While watching fireworks we observed two different types of ufo's in the sky in porltland, oregon.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Seven witnesses observed glowing lights after returning from a boating trip on the fourth of july of 2015. at around 10:30 pm, three witnesses at the rear of the boat observe what appeared to be a yellow/orange glowing light while looking at the night sky. we assumed it to be a planet or bright star. however, several minutes later, it disappeared. roughly forty-five minutes later, several more lights began to appear without having ascended from the ground and just simply appeared high in the sky. there were seven witnesses to this event, in which there were seven lights. the lights seemed to maneuver independently, but occasionally appeared to be in two triangular formations. each object moved silently and ascended and descended slightly multiple times and sometimes moved in horizontal motions. about ten to twenty minutes later, each object began to disappear one by one. some appeared to change shape slightly by becoming more of an oval before dimming and disappearing. for the next twenty minutes or so, a couple of the objects reappeared but ascended and disappeared shortly after. we stood on the boat at the dock in confusion and debated as to what the lights could be. all of the fourth of july fireworks displays in the area had finished over an hour and a half prior to the initial sighting. since the events, we have all been wondering what the moving lights were, why they were there for so long, and why they kept returning.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seven glowing lights appear in the sky and each disappear and reappear multiple times within about an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Went to patio doors to look at sky as always do, i saw a golf ball size flash then a light same size,then there was a beam kind of light,  lasted around 15 seconds, then another star size abject appeared , that hovered for a few seconds then went to go from my north east to west, and then stopped, after around 30 seconds or so , then it started to fly back towards my west, it was like it came from the huge light, there was 2 guys walking through the park at the time, as i live right at the back of the park , and not sure if they saw this also , i did try to grab my camera, but couldn't seem to find it again in the sky
content.summary: Flash/light for around 15 seconds in sky size of golf ball , then a object appeared smaller than the light  , looked star like and went on different path to bigger object

content.detailedDescription: About 5 minutes after the beginning (9:35ish) of the annual 4th of july fireworks at hampton beach, nh., i witnessed a small glowing red orb.  at first i believed it was a chinese lantern, which i had seen many of earlier, but it was stationary.  after a few seconds, the orb began to move against the breeze in a straight line (east to west) very slowly. the orb again stopped for a few seconds, then ascended in a straight line, went stationary again for a few seconds, descended, went stationary again, then traveled west to east on a straight line.  the orb, at times, became partially obscured by a house but would either ascend above it, or move east of it to come into few. the object was never lower than 45 degrees off the horizon but probably ascended to about 75 degrees above the horizon. there were no visible flashing lights and no sound.  seabrook nuclear power plant lies just about mile west of the beach and the object seemed to split the difference of the two while the fireworks were going off.  the orb then descended behind a building and i never regained sight of it.  i was very excited and frantic while trying to keep the orb in sight.  about 15 minutes after the event, i started to think of other possibilities.  the most probable being a drone taking video of the fireworks from an elevated position.  my wife also saw the object move east to west after being stationary for about 30 seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red ball witnessed during hampton beach 4th of july fireworks

content.detailedDescription: Was at my daughters house in crown point celebrating 4th of july.  watching grandchildren doing some fireworks when we all observed a rather large black circle moving across the sky from the south moving eastward.   there were 6 witnesses.  the object looked like a smoke ring but too high up and never dissapated.   center almost look like it was jellylike, no color, see through (like an amebia) or like the way heat radiates from the top of a grill when hot.  watched it for several seconds and grabbed ipad trying to capture it on video which i did.  also took some still photos.  husband and daughter also took some snapshots of object.  it continued to travel but as it got farther away we lost sight of it. at first we thought it was birds but just didn't look the way we had ever seen them migrate before and shape did not change. i suppose it could have been some kind of insect swarm except for that wavy like middle and the fact it never seemed to loose circular shape.  i had a really funny feeling afterwards.  can't explain.  just felt like we witness something really strange.
content.summary: On 4th of july saw a circular shape with transparent center that looked like a smoke ring moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: First seen white light object slowly moving in a straight line from a sout to north west direction. it changed colour to a copper like light. it appeared to ascend in to an outer orbit then disappeared into the night sky. it looked like it travelled in a direction away from the planet. it was a quiet evening when this ufo was observed. no other aircraft was observed in the area until approximately 20 minutes later. the event from when i first saw the light to when it disappeared lasted no longer than 10 minutes. there was no obvious noise. the object was round, star like.
content.summary: Glowed white then changed to copper colour, looked like star, moving then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Seen in sky. repeated same flight pattern 4 times. during fireworks it appeared as to camouflage itself. started in north - moved short distance to west. it started bright yellow with glow all around it. it slowly turned orange as it hovered. then faded to red until it couldn't be seen anymore. did this 4 times in the exact same flight pattern and location.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen in sky. repeated same flight pattern 4 times.

content.detailedDescription:
On one sunday in the summer at approximately 8:00am at some point in the period between 1947 and 1949, my mother and her two sisters were walking home after attending a children’s mass in rural providence, rhode island. 

at the time, all three sisters were under 10 years old. 
directly in front of their house was a field which they used as a shortcut on their way home from the church. 

in the field, the sisters clearly saw a 20-30 feet high metallic gray “football” shaped object (wider than it was high) possibly with multiple (3 or 4) “landing legs” resting on the ground. at that time, the sisters believed that they were possibly seeing a blimp, since they had heard of blimps and of course had seen pictures of them. they could not otherwise think of what this object could be, although they all agree it did not look like what they thought a blimp should look like up close. 

they passed within 10 feet of the object but did not get closer or touch it. the object was not making any noise. no propeller was visible. the object did not have tailfins or stabilizers. there was no apparent writing on the object. there were windows/portholes visible on the object. no occupants were seen either through the windows or on the ground near the object. the object was not “tethered” to a mooring or ground vehicle as a blimp would normally require, nor was there any ground crew. the object did not have a gondola at the bottom. 
although there were nearby houses, it was early, and nobody else appeared to be awake at the time, or at least nobody was outside. 
upon entering their home, they told their father (my grandfather), who immediately raced out of the house to see the object. he had always been interested in technology (the kind of man who built one of the first televisions in his neighborhood from a kit). when they exited the front of the house, the field was visible, and there was no object in the field. no object was seen rising from the field or in the sky. there was insufficient time for a blimp to have flown away in the moments that elapsed since they left the field. according to my research, blimps currently travel at approximately 35mph and likely take several minutes to maneuver, rise and reach this speed from the ground. i do not know what speed blimps traveled in the 40’s, but it was most definitely not faster than today’s technology. 

no remaining markings on the ground were noticed, although they didn’t think to check that at the time. no further investigation was performed.

my mother recalls hearing reports of other strange sightings of objects (in the air) during that period, but nobody ever claimed to have seen this particular object. 

this object was not reported to authorities by my grandfather. 
the incident was never forgotten, and had been repeated verbatim since i was a child by all three sisters and my grandfather. the facts between the sisters remain generally consistent with the above, although there is some disagreement on whether the object had landing legs and the exact number of legs (0, 3 or 4). the two oldest sisters were certain it had landing legs.

all three sisters are still alive (although my grandfather has passed away) and all are available to answer further questions.

attached is an aerial photo of the site showing the exact landing area.

you can easily find this on google earth using the coordinates: 41◦49’ 18.07” n 71◦26’49.68” w. i have marked on the aerial view the location of the church and the field (note that there is a basketball court there now if you look at more recent aerial images). i have not marked the location of the house, but it was directly across (east) from the field. oddly enough, the object was seen on the ground in the southernmost corner of the field directly on the baseball diamond. the worn spot on the ground is the result of more recent baseball games. before the school was built, baseball was played there, but in a different corner of the field. 

this neighborhood has changed little since that time, with the exception of the building of a school in the northern portion of the field, and the absence of a building that burned down across from the church. approximately 5 houses were torn down to clear the way for the school, so the field is roughly the same size as it was in the 40’s. 
my mother is one of the most trustworthy sources i know, and i say that not only because she is my mother. she is old fashioned to an extent, and not prone to a wild imagination or belief in any new age theories. apart from this one event, she has lived a very normal lower-middle class life with no deviations into the unusual whatsoever. she has one unusual characteristic – she can remember the finest details of the most mundane events, so remembering this event is particularly easy for her. she can recall the neighborhood with amazing detail. she can tell you what color each house was in the neighborhood back in the 40’s. this is, of course, a single event 60 years ago, so there is naturally some faded memory of this event.

my aunts are also trustworthy, with one of them being a former teacher and the valedictorian in mathematics from a large rhode island college. i have never known any of them to exaggerate or fabricate stories. 

attached is the witnesses best approximation of the object.
content.summary: 20-30 foot tall metallic gray "football" shaped object on ground, witnessed by 3 people within 10 feet.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down naperville/washington rd. i believe. area is unfamiliar to me. two dark boomerang objects parallel to one another in close quarters moving at same speed very quickly. i believe speed increased as the objects moved farther away, which i believe was a south west direction. i pointed the objects out to my passenger , watching the confusion and facial reaction change to what they were witnessing i returned to watching the objects move at an accelerated speed until they were invisible. i was telling my passenger i wish i could get a closer look because i really want to know what it was. then a short moment later my passenger excitidly pointed to our left to see only one of the objects in the southern sky moving west asking me do i see it and what was it. i tried to view it but was unsuccessful. my passenger said they saw it just above the tree line and it was still a distance away. at the last moment the treeline fully obstructed the view. it was also the end of the tree line so excitidly we continued to look on to find the object must have dissapeared. there was a good clearing at the end of the tree line. if it did not dissappear it must have instantly changed directions. they appeared to be about the size of a full sized jet, maybe a little smaller. we could not identify these objects, they made no noise had no emission and moved quicker than any commercial jet. if it were a military jet i believe it would have broke the sound barrier. driving in an unfamilliar area and being the driver i was not able to get a view of the second boomerang object.
content.summary: First observed two black boomerang objects moving southwest at high speed, one returned above treeline going west.

content.detailedDescription: It was the fourth of july and the city i live in, cape coral, was doing it's annual firework show. my dad took me to the area where they were launching the fireworks. it was about 10:00 pm est when me and my father noticed a lone light in the sky, at first we though nothing of it but then it started to pulsate a little, this caught my attention and when i directed my dad towards the light. at first he didn't see it because of the fireworks but when there was an interval he saw and stated that's a little weird. it just hovered and stayed there while we tried to debunk what it could be. it was not an airplane for it was stationary and did not have triangular light pattern, it was a singular light. my dad pulled out his star map app on his phone and when he pointed it at the object the closest thing it could be was a star ( i can not remember the name but it is one of the brightest stars in the night), but it was far to the left. then we though of helicopters (this of course was when the terrorist organization isis threatened america for an attack on july 4th and there were swat and helicopters in the sky). so as of now that is the most logical reasoning for a natural and man-made explanation. after about ten minutes the light then turned a white-red and then flew down or flew away (from my angle i could not tell) very fast. then after that i never saw the object again. the only way i could describe it was mesmerizing and, in a way, glad to have encountered a ufo for the first time. my dad believes it is a helicopter, but as for me i do not think so. for one it was a singular green light that turned white-red, two it flew away at fast speeds that was faster than a descending or accelerating helicopter, three the helicopters had search lights on and this light did not have that at all and it was behind the fireworks, and finally it was stationary while the helicopters were patrolling the area. so in my own personal opinion, this was a ufo and not anything man-made, and while i may be approached with people saying you just imagined it or you were seeing and misinterpreting things but i know what i saw, and i will affirm to this opinion unless strongly proven otherwise.
content.summary: Fourth of july hovering light (cape coral, fl)

content.detailedDescription:
Las vegas sighting _ july 4th 2015

on a night when you'd expect to see an array of lights, my family / group and i never expected to see what we saw over the trees to the southeast of our driveway. seven of us, my wife, two daughters and three of their friends, all grown, were over and enjoyed the 4th's activities, when at 9 p.M. we went outside to watch the fireworks. i noticed one of our company looking into the nighttime sky to the southeast, when i looked up and saw a lit up object that seemed to be something other then fireworks. it was just hovering bright and blue-green in color at first, then it moved ever so slowly and i thought it was a helicopter, meanwhile it had all of our attention by now, except my wife who went inside for something. it was then that the airborne craft started to move and made a sudden turn and as it did it began to fade and reappear as a bright reddish-orange color, turn back to the direction it had been visible as a blue-green object and darted back to it's original position in the sky that we had first noticed it. there it turned back to to the blue-green and started to maneuver through the sky as something very different then fireworks or helicopter 
or anything that i've ever seen. i called for my wife to hurry back out side and look at this object. i called to her twice and finally asked her to drop whatever she was doing and please come now! ( meanwhile fireworks are going off all around us and this craft has our rapt attention)! my wife came back out and immediately started to film it on her smartphone, we ended up with approx. seven minutes of video but during that time all we could do is watch this object in between the burst of the fireworks celebration which it seemed very interested in as it seemed to be drawn to the larger explosions. it continued to change color between the blue-green to red-orange as it changed direction or sped up and slowed down. it had a range of speed from just hovering to darting through the sky in an instant, ascending, descending at times and changing course at very unusual angles, sometimes slowly, other times quickly. we all thought about what it could be, a very different firework, a helicopter, a blimp, a drone, a prank somebody conceived because everyone in the neighborhood would be watching up into the nighttime sky and what a dupe or "viral-video" that would make but in the end none of these made any sense. as in the end it darted out a bit of instant, returned half the distance and started to descend beyond the trees and went out of sight. we all at some point thought it was a ufo and explained what we each saw and all agreed it wasn't anything like any of us had seen before. my wife later uploaded her video to her computer and we both understood why 99% of the videos you see of the ufo sightings are so grainy, you just don't expect to see something like this and when you do you use the best tool available to you to record it and in this case it was a smartphone. aliens, i don't know. ufo, meaning that none of us in our group could identify it, yes. i'm just hoping to see something about this on the news tomorrow to verify what we saw wasn't a july fourth event the city of las vegas put on to wow it's citizens! we're hoping others saw this as there have had to be dozens of witnesses with it being the 4th of july and so many would have been looking into the sky enjoying the firework celebrations.
content.summary: Glowing, hovering sphere

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fiance was at the racetrack in sandusky watching races. and all of a sudden i noticed 4 bright orbs off in the distance. we watched them for about a minute and then remembered my cell can take recordings. so i recorded about a minute of these lights.
content.summary: Lighted orbs changing direction with lights fading in and out

content.detailedDescription: My husband, mother and i were in cold spring, ny for the 4th of july fireworks.  after the fireworks while in the municipal parking lot we looked at the stars in the sky and their constellations.  we noticed one bright "star" that was not like the others.  the glowing object was orange in color and moved north slowly over west point military academy.  at one point it remained stationary.  several times it emitted smaller glowing lights from its rear/bottom that appeared to fall down and disappear.  the object disappeared and reappeared several times.  after 8-10 minutes we did not see it reappear and decided to leave to go home.
content.summary: Star-like orange glowing orb/point of light in the sky emitting smaller orange lights.  object disappeared and reappeared several times.

content.detailedDescription: We traveled to seaside, oregon to watch fireworks on the beach.  we noticed a glowing vibrant green, square/oval shaped object hovering in the sk . it seemed to be over the ocean, on the edge of land.  we watched for roughly an hour and a half, it would hover, rapidly decrease altitude, zip to the right, and then left, and once in a while it would briefly change to a vibrant red glow.  ag one point, we witnessed it disappear and then reappear.  at one point, we saw 3 of these objects in close proximity of each other in the sky.  i'm not sure of it is relevant, but at the time we witnessed this, there was a beachfront power outage.   we do have a bit of video footage of the event.  my husband thought perhaps it was a drone, i disagreed.  i've had one ufo sighting in nh, and the movement was eerily similar.  it seemed the objects were more prominent while the fireworks were happening (no, it was not a firework, and i was not impaired from alcohol), they just seemed to be very interested in the firework.  our video seems to have lost resolution, as we are sending from my phone, but we captured the object in a screenshot
content.summary: Witnessed ufo hover, rapidly increase altitude, zip sideways, lights change to red, then disappeared. we have video footage

content.detailedDescription: My daughter way in a different location in greenbrier ar. and she filmed it on her phone. and yes i can tell the difference from a firework and a strange light.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watching fireworks and noticed strange moving orange/red ball moving south to west towards the east from where i was standing. then is hovered and turned west moved up and down the disappeared. seamed interested in firworks.

content.detailedDescription:
I am the mufon investigator for new hampshire.  i have not personally observed an anomalous object since the hillsdale college, michigan incident in1966. 

our family was on a tourist boat, on our way back from newport, ri fireworks.  we decided to look for satellites and shooting stars during our 1.5 hour return trip to port.  about half way through the return trip i noticed a bright light.  it was much brighter than any star in our field of view. there appeared to be 3 objects orbiting one another in a very tight circle.  each object would glow bright white and then dim. the entire event lasted 30 to 60 seconds.  i had no feelings or sensations.  i would estimate the altitude of the objects to be 30,000 feet plus.

the weather was fair (60 degrees). we had nearly unlimited visibility.  the winds were out of the south at 10 knots.  we saw 4 shooting stars and 8 satellites (iridium constellation?)  none of these observations looked like the ufo.
content.summary: Approximately 3 objects.  glowing orbs and transiting from very bright to dim.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out back of my house and noticed a deep orange, round, pulsating light coming from the east. once i had my eyes fixed upon it, it stopped and slowly dimmed until the orange color had disappeared. the orange color came back on and the orb began to move along a straight path. again after traveling for another few seconds it repeated the exact hoover and dimming, then moved on behind the tree line where i lost sight of it.

the whole event felt as some sort of acknowledgement that it had been seen.
content.summary: I witnessed an orange orb type light that pulsated moving from east to west by north west.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir.
i am a ufologist since the 80s, but now i have more free time because i am retired.
i watch strange phenomenon's every night with binoculars{10x50},  or single eye, from white,blue or reddish dots of light in all directions but much more under the ursula major. this dots are not planes because i can see them to, and i live at 18 km from lisbon, front of the sea, atlantic ocean.
in the 80s and since then i put my self in doubt because i thinking maybe there was satellites.
i went to army, nato cryptologist and communications operator, 5 years of my life in the nato communications centre in lisbon, 1st corporal. i was all my life a communications and informatics technician, retired from portugal telecom.  
now we got laptops and software to track satellites in real time and i never got a match from the things i see.
i got the impression i am living under a high altitude alley {from the 20 to 50 km altitude}, i see every night this dots of light at an incredible speed, they cross all this region in less than noting, coming and go from all directions. some we can see with naked eye, others because off the pollution, only with binoculars.
but in the friday the 24 of june i make the observation of my life till now, i start to see a very fast flashing light, 3 times more than a plane and was a mixing of white/blue thunder light coming from north, then more 5 dots show up behind the first one the moving very slow, without noise coming from different directions. the first one stay at front and the others stop in the sky above my head, i shout to my son to come up and see and he fells afraid. they stay 2 to 3 minutes and after they start to move to the directions i describe. i see yesterday 2 of this ones. 
dear sir my concern is only one, this planet belongs to who?
we people of earth we got the solar fleet or not? if not, thats the reason because the superpower country of the world make segregation of this subject, now i understand...
i upload some home vídeos not edited from 1 or 2 dots i could recorded because they was so bright, the toshiba camileo camera i got was able to record, but im not a expert and zooming makes difficult to stay quiet and focus on the object.
mufon is the first one to see this objects and i invite some one to look at the sky at night and see what i see every night. they are not satellites, they are at 800 km + - and at a speed 7.8 km sec, never match the software tracking satellite and most part is stationary.
what or who they/this things are? the entire world needs a answer.
thank you for your time

manuel salvador
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: They come from diferent directions, they meet, they stop and then they go but more slow than a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
I attempted to summon ufo's after observing prophet yahweh on youtube. i did't really expect a result but i thought i had nothing to lose by trying. i didn't see anything  and gave it no further thought. when i returned back home upon further inspection of the photos that i'd taken i noticed in one photo a ufo was visible. i did't notice this first hand, only post facto after showing the photos to a friend at work. i took the photos with my iphone 5s and the ufo is only really visible in one photo after manually zooming in. 
blown away by the whole experience, i'm planning to return to tiwanaku to re-attempt a ufo summoning.
content.summary: Glowing craft. discovered on photo post facto

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside watching fireworks ( july 4th,2015)  it was around 10:30ish at address listed.  we were looking at the big dipper ( was straight over ahead at time.) 

in the back yard i was sitting at,  the fireworks already were starting to come to an end. or less frequent at the time.  but the view or patch of sky we were looking at the time was mostly (n or nw bound.)

while observing the sky, i gazed again towards the night sky in a north direction, and i saw this hovering dredal looking object ( which suddenly appeared must) , if i held something in the air to compare its size it would of been bigger then a grain of rice, but smaller then an aspirin. 

description was dredal shaped, it had a 1/3 white top and the 2/3 bottom half  and it was green. it was steady glowing. at first i thought it maybe some type of firework, but no explosion, then maybe i thought it was an airplane in the distance  flying toward us or away. but again it remained stationary and size remained the same.

i'm ex-military and i'm very familiar in the aviation field, i would say on an expert level. i do have qualifications backing up this claim.

i knew right away now, i was observing a ufo. my brother in law who was watching this with me, and my sister saw it also.  he thought it possibly could be a drone. although, i do not have any experience with drones. logic still applies,  if this a drone i'm seeing, then it was a professional or possibly a military grade small aircraft. 

what i witnessed was zero erratic movement, it was as stationary as a star while it hovered for over a minute, and when it descending. it was a perfectly straight line with out any turbulence ( no sudden dips) , that a small flying craft should experience.

secondly, it couldn't of been a helicopter,  although it moved like one on a y-axis. it was silent and close enough we would of heard it and there was not any strobe or beacon lights, and the descending movement was way to fast and way to low for recovery. if it was a helicopter without a crash. the best word to describe the way it descended was a fluid like. 

my best description of the even it was unnatural, and something i was very unfamiliar with of any type of aviation craft i have seen.  shape/colors/movement/silence, were all foreign to me. i believe i witnessed some type of remarkably new technology or something other worldly. either way it was an ufo for sure.
content.summary: Dredal looking ufo, white top/green bottom glowing steady. stationary, then descended

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i got out of the car & thought we saw a drone or kids helicopter above the city. we walked towards it beginnt to assume it was a human unmanned aircraft then we realized there was a black rotating oblique cylinder rotating inside an almost clear perfect circle. it rotated every second inside the sphere. the sphere looked like it was somehow carrying this black object. it hovered while it ascended. it gave off the impression it was moving slow but somehow ended up going from low down by the city all the way up past where jets fly until it was gone. it's coloring didn't change as it got higher. you could see the piercing black of it way beyond where you see a jet fly. the object inside of it rotated the whole time and it was silent. we both have never seen anything like it. it felt like a movie. the pictures submitted are the object drawn by my mother and i in seperate rooms. we almost drew the same thing without talking about it.
content.summary: Super black cylinder inside hovering almost clear sphere

content.detailedDescription: There were two lights. one was brighter then the other. the other not so much but still visable. there were nothing else going on in that area. they were just hovering. later we took two pictures, but for some reason can not upload them.
content.summary: 2 bright lights hovering for about 2-3 hours
